Now, I know what everyone is going to say ‘no of course not’. This is true, and my point. NO, you shouldnt. No matter what religion you are, we are all alive for a reason, a purpose. I personally think we are all here for a reason, to help, to serve others etc. Iy doesn't have to be big, by just showing love to another, teaching a child something. We have so many things to look forward to in life, whether it kids, holidays, pets, jobs, love, family. I can't tell you what will happen if you die, maybe no one will notice, maybe people will. You are on this Earth for a purpose, and you will fulfill that purpose till your last breath.
